document.full_text: libyan forces shelled a port area in western libya on wednedsay, killing a woman, a man and two children as an international aid ship was docked, a medical official said.
document.title: libyan government forces shell port as aid ship docks
lines_and_colors: libyan forces shelled a port area in western libya on wednedsay, killing a woman, a man and two children as an international aid ship was docked, a medical official said.
